    • runPower

      public void runPower​(ModelGame modelGame, Worker worker, Cell position)
      Execute the state action
      Parameters:
      modelGame - is the model of the game
      worker - is the worker used by the player
      position - is the position where the action will take place
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if position is not a valid cell

    • isWinner

      public boolean isWinner​(ModelGame modelGame, Worker worker, Cell position)
      Check if the worker used by the player let him win the game
      Parameters:
      modelGame - is the game
      worker - is the worker used by the player
      position - is the position from where the worker moved up
      Returns:
      true if the player win, otherwise false
